posts.name: Hsifeulbhsifder
posts.cooked: I am calling TrajectoryUtil.fromPathweaverJson() with a correct path. I know this is a correct path because I can ssh directly to the files on the rio and see them (I also chmod 777’d them). I also know this is the correct path because the line before TrajectoryUtil.fromPathweaverJson(), file.exists() returns true for the exact path (same Path object). The exact same code works on the simulator too. I know that 2021.3.1 WPILIB had this issue, my question is: is there anything I am missing or why is this not fixed?

posts.name: Peter Johnson
posts.cooked: What are the details of the exception?  The fromPathweaverJson method throws IOException if any exception is thrown reading the file, including parse errors (e.g. it can’t be parsed as JSON, or it doesn’t have the keys it should have).

posts.name: Dan Langdon
posts.cooked: Path is case sensitive as well so any spaces or case errors in the path name will cause it to not import

posts.name: Jason Daming
posts.cooked: Can you link to your code and your path file?

posts.name: Dan Langdon
posts.cooked: This has 2 paths.  I think we are now importing 9 paths. Let me know if this helps or you have questions

posts.name: Jason Daming
posts.cooked:
I am sorry I should have been more clear.  I was asking for OP to post their code / paths.  Maybe this will help them though!

Hsifeulbhsifder:

I know that 2021.3.1 WPILIB had this issue

What issue specifically are you talking about?

posts.name: Peter Johnson
posts.cooked:
jdaming:

What issue specifically are you talking about?

[wpimath] Fix IOException path in WPIMath JNI wpilibsuite:main ← lhvy:patch-1 opened 11:21PM - 22 Jul 21 UTC lhvy +2 -2

[wpimath] Fix IOException path in WPIMath JNI wpilibsuite:main ← lhvy:patch-1 opened 11:21PM - 22 Jul 21 UTC lhvy +2 -2

wpilibsuite:main ← lhvy:patch-1

opened 11:21PM - 22 Jul 21 UTC lhvy +2 -2

opened 11:21PM - 22 Jul 21 UTC

lhvy

+2 -2

The current 2021.3.1 release refers to `java/lang/IOException` which causes the … following exception when using `toPathweaverJson` or `fromPathweaverJson`:

```
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: java/lang/IOException
    at edu.wpi.first.math.WPIMathJNI.fromPathweaverJson(Native Method)
    at edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.trajectory.TrajectoryUtil.fromPathweaverJson(TrajectoryUtil.java:79)
```

The current 2021.3.1 release refers to `java/lang/IOException` which causes the … following exception when using `toPathweaverJson` or `fromPathweaverJson`:

```
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: java/lang/IOException
    at edu.wpi.first.math.WPIMathJNI.fromPathweaverJson(Native Method)
    at edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.trajectory.TrajectoryUtil.fromPathweaverJson(TrajectoryUtil.java:79)
```

Note this didn’t raise IOException, it actually raised NoClassDefFoundError, but the error referred to IOException.
